title: Red alert issued to 16 districts on gusty winds: Met Dept.
paragraphs: A Red alert on gusty winds has been issued for 16 districts, the Department of Meteorology said today. They said the strong winds could blow due to the active south-west monsoon conditions over the country.

As a result of this, fairly strong winds of up to 40-50 km/h and could be expected to gather speed up to 60 km/h on the western slope of the central hills, in the Northern, North-Central and North-Western provinces, and in the Hambantota and Trincomalee districts.

Accordingly, the 16 districts, including Jaffna, Kilinochchi, Mullaitivu, Mannar, Vavuniya, Trincomalee, Anuradhapura, Puttalam, Kurunegala, Kegalle, Kandy, Nuwara-Eliya, Ratnapura, Galle, Matara, and Hambantota, have been alerted about the weather conditions.
People who are living in the above areas are cautioned to be vigilant in this regard. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
